name: Time To Die (Micah McFarland)
description:
NOTE: This game runs best when downloaded on Mac or Windows PC. Some graphical issues may occur when playing the embedded version.

Congrats! You've lived a long, fulfilling life and now it's time to die and give that body to another deserving soul.

Time To Die is a short visual novel about choosing your legacy. 

In the future, medicine becomes so advanced that human bodies don't die or even deteriorate, so the only sensible way to keep the world in balance is to cycle souls in and out of the same bodies. 

Interview three different souls and decide which one you want to "take over" after you're gone. What you say affects whether or not your souls are compatible -- which can lead to either catastrophic failure or incredible success. No pressure!

  • 15 minutes average playtime
  • Three different soul characters to interact with
  • A hidden point system based on your choices
  • 9 different endings
  • 6 original songs
  • Original hand-drawn art and sprites
  • Multiple font options for accessibility
